properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: UNLIMITED FREE PARKING  Good spot to park your VAN being right next to a small river which can be accessed from a pebble beach below 30 meters. We parked in front of the only bench in the parking lot which is on the river and tree side under a shaded area which was super nice to open our van door and have lunch on it in the morning. Only 20 meters away in the direction of the sports center there is an area reserved for sorting recycling waste. At the top of the parking lot there is a bridge with signage indicating various hiking departures as well as mountain biking trails. I would say that the strong point of this car park is that it is free  unlimited quiet to sleep at night from 9 p.m. there is hardly any passing car and only 16 minutes by Car Postal take bus n  453 of the cable cars that lead to MONTE SAN SALVATORE. The bus costs only 2. CHF to go full price and it runs once an hour every H35.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.71)
properties.description: The best parking to visit Milan.It is a car park but it allows motorhomes.The parking lot has a booth where the person who controls the parking lot is during the day not at night.The price for the whole day is only 2 yes for motorhomes too.At night the controller leaves but the parking lot remains open.Right in front of the Cologno Nord metro station.For 2.20 you go to Piazza del Duomo in 35 minutes taking lines M2 and M1.If you walk through Milan and arrive at the Navigli Canals you can also return to the car park in 50 minutes using the direct M2 line to Cologno Nord which is the last stop.And best of all I WAS NOT ROBBED or anything like that. As the criticism of parking in Milan is it is something to take into account.I didnt stay the night because I imagine there would be a lot of traffic with cars parking very early but I understand that it could be done. But to visit Milan for the whole day and leave afterwards I think there is nothing better.PS if you can park near the drivers booth even better

Almost all are suitable for large campers.
